title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 77.6 - Employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 77.6 - Employees

State Regulations

No person may be employed in any capacity in a licensed
private service bureau who has been convicted of a felony or a misdemeanor
unless such person is approved by the Commissioner of Motor

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
